department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: a wooden slit gong surmounted by a human head; the slit has been filled with magical substances with traces of red and white pigments; the neck wears a necklace of small white beads; the face has soft, realistic features  slit mouth, straight sensitive nose with drilled nostrils, coffee-bean eyes, curved ears behind whiskers, five-point scarifications on the forehead; the coiffure is crest-like, tapering to a point in the neck; the top of the head carries a seashell; mount L1.6 MS
title: Slit Gong
